self.name: urlAuthResultRequest
self.description: Details about the authorization request, for more info click here »
self.descriptionExcerpt: Details about the authorization request, for more info click here »

arguments.name: requestWriteAccess
arguments.description: Whether the bot would like to send messages to the user

arguments.name: bot
arguments.description: Username of a bot, which will be used for user authorization. If not specified, the current bot's username will be assumed. The url's domain must be the same as the domain linked with the bot. See Linking your domain to the bot for more details.

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: The domain name of the website on which the user will log in.
